description: Transforms a directed acyclic graph (DAG) into code.

parameters.name: DagNodes
parameters.description: A list of the nodes in the DAG. (dict) --- Represents a node in a directed acyclic graph (DAG) A node identifier that is unique within the node's graph. The type of node that this is. Properties of the node, in the form of name-value pairs. (dict) --- An argument or property of a node. The name of the argument or property. The value of the argument or property. Param (boolean) --- True if the value is used as a parameter. LineNumber (integer) --- The line number of the node.

nested_params.name: Id
nested_params.description: A node identifier that is unique within the node's graph.

nested_params.name: NodeType
nested_params.description: The type of node that this is.

nested_params.name: Args
nested_params.description: Properties of the node, in the form of name-value pairs.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the argument or property.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the argument or property.

nested_params.name: Param
nested_params.description: True if the value is used as a parameter.

nested_params.name: LineNumber
nested_params.description: The line number of the node.

parameters.name: DagEdges
parameters.description: A list of the edges in the DAG. (dict) --- Represents a directional edge in a directed acyclic graph (DAG). The ID of the node at which the edge starts. The ID of the node at which the edge ends. TargetParameter (string) --- The target of the edge.

nested_params.name: Source
nested_params.description: The ID of the node at which the edge starts.

nested_params.name: Target
nested_params.description: The ID of the node at which the edge ends.

nested_items.name: PythonScript
nested_items.description: The Python script generated from the DAG.

nested_items.name: ScalaCode
nested_items.description: The Scala code generated from the DAG.
